DOC.brief_title: Disseminating Evidence-based Practice Schools : CBT Child Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: The present study test implementation sustainability ( ) Computer-Assisted Cognitive-Behavioral Treatment ( CACBT ) youth anxiety ( b ) BASC-2 TRS identify anxious youth school set use cohort-sequential design ( i.e. , three year 20 school span five year ) . There 3 phase : Phase I ( baseline ) : Gather data prevalence service provide via screen measure treatment tracker : Phase II ( implementation ) : Train school staff identification anxious youth ( i.e . BASC-2 TRS ) provision intervention ( i.e. , CACBT ) , modify assessment treatment procedure best fit individual school . Identify barrier facilitator implementation gather qualitative experience school staff : Phase II ( sustainability ) : Discontinue train supervision . Assess sustainability assessment intervention . Identify barrier facilitator implementation gather qualitative experience school staff . 'Camp Cope-A-Lot ( Computer-assisted CBT program ) ''
DOC.criteria: All mental health worker ( e.g. , guidance , social work , school psychologist ) school eligible trained .
